sentences.en: Bates looks like a good-natured lad.
sentences.cn: 贝茨看起来像个性情温和的小伙子。

sentences.en: Come along, lad. Time for you to get home.
sentences.cn: 来吧，小伙子。你该回家了。

sentences.en: He is a bright lad , always quick on the up take.
sentences.cn: 他是个聪明的孩子, 理解力很强.

sentences.en: He was a nice lad — bright and with a sunny disposition.
sentences.cn: 他是个不错的小伙子——聪明伶俐而且性格开朗。

sentences.en: He was a young lad, very green, very immature.
sentences.cn: 他还是个毛头小子，幼稚得很，一点都不成熟。

sentences.en: He's a mere slip of a lad compared to his brother.
sentences.cn: 跟他哥哥一比，他不过是个小毛孩。

sentences.en: He's a nice lad, and is quick on the draw.
sentences.cn: 他是个不错的小伙子, 而且头脑也灵活.

sentences.en: He's a sensitive lad and some of the criticism has stung him.
sentences.cn: 他是个敏感的小伙子，有些批评刺痛了他。
这个小家伙愁眉苦脸，一副垂头丧气的样子。

sentences.en: The lad was wearing rubber-soled shoes.
sentences.cn: 这个小伙子穿着橡胶底的鞋子。

sentences.en: The little lad was playing on the swing.
Things have changed since I was a lad.
sentences.cn: 从我幼时至今，一切都发生了变化。

sentences.en: Things were different when I was a lad.
sentences.cn: 我年轻的时候，情况可不大相同。

sentences.en: When he was a little lad, I used to sing him lullabies.
sentences.cn: 在他小时候, 我常常给他唱摇篮曲.

trans.tran_cn: 少年，小伙子，〈口〉伙伴，老朋友，〈英〉管赛马房的马夫，〈俚〉情人
